entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 6:54 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
